children.text: Install this first free episode of the "UK Life" audio series. A personalised look at life in the UK, from football and cars to food and drink, through the eyes of a British person. This series is only available exclusively through the LearnEnglish Audio & Video app. If you like this episode, download the rest of the "UK Life" audio series!
Kicking a ball around with friends is one of the most natural things in childhood. But like life itself, the game of football changes as we get older.

content-desc: Episode 1: "UK Life" podcasts - FREE, Navigate up
